briefTitle: A Phase II/III Study of Sargramostim
officialTitle: A Phase II/III Study of Sargramostim in Patients With Coronavirus Disease-2019 (COVID-19)
summary: This is a randomized, placebo-controlled, double-blind, group comparison, multicenter study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of inhalation administration of sargramostim for 5 days, in principle (up to 10 days) as Add-on treatment to the standard treatment in COVID-19 patients.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Period until Day 28 (including the case after discharge).
